title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles model weights, config and data into a single Modelfile; macOS/Linux/Windows, REST & CLI APIs.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client & async helpers for the Ollama REST API; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm i ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter wrapping Ollama Python client for chains, agents, tool-calling, RAG.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; docker run -p 3000:8080 ollama-webui/ollama-webui.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; Maven Central artifact net.ollama4j.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem; gem install ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich CLI wrapper (prompt history, syntax highlighting) built on ollama-js; npm i -g ollama-cli.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes Copilot requests to local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama generators & embedders for pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker image with GPU & CPU runners; docker run -d -p 11434:11434 ollama/ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Kubernetes; helm repo add otwld https://otwld.github.io/ollama-helm.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG, fine-tune LoRA, function-calling, CI/CD, edge deployment.

title: ollama-gpt4all
summary: Mirror converting GPT4All models to Ollama Modelfiles; one-click import.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs (Go, Rust, C#, Swift, Dart).

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot with slash commands, threads, model switching.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async client for Ollama; cargo add ollama-rs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama inside CI pipelines for LLM-based tests.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template using Ollama; pip install streamlit-ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama with CUDA & ROCm support; nix run nixpkgs#ollama.
